verses.verse: Therefore <S%G3606><s%>, holy <S%G40><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%>, partakers <S%G3353><s%> of the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%>, consider <S%G2657><s%> the Apostle <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> High Priest <S%G749><s%> of <S%G3671><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> profession <S%G3671><s%>, Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>;

Who was <S%G5607><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> to him that appointed <S%G4160><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> was faithful in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man was counted worthy <S%G515><s%> of <S%G1391><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>, in <S%G2596><s%> asmuch as <S%G3745><s%> he who has built <S%G2680><s%> the house <S%G846><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> than the house <S%G3624><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is built <S%G2680><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G1161><s%>; but he that built <S%G2680><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> is God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> was faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> a servant <S%G2324><s%>, for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> of those things which were to be spoken after <S%G2980><s%>;

But <S%G1161><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>; whose <S%G3739><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> are we <S%G2070><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> hold fast <S%G2722><s%> the confidence <S%G3954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the rejoicing <S%G2745><s%> of the hope <S%G1680><s%> firm <S%G949><s%> unto <S%G3360><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> (as <S%G2531><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> says <S%G3004><s%>, To day <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>,

Harden <S%G4645><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the provocation <S%G3894><s%>, in <S%G2596><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of temptation <S%G3986><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>:

When <S%G3757><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, tested <S%G1381><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I was grieved with <S%G4360><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, They do <S%G4105><s%> always <S%G104><s%> err <S%G4105><s%> in <S%G2588><s%> their heart <S%G2588><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> have <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%>.

So <S%G5613><s%> I swore <S%G3660><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%>, They shall <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G1487><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>.)

Take care <S%G991><s%>, brothers <S%G80><s%>, lest <S%G3379><s%> there be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> an <S%G2588><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> of unbelief <S%G570><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> departing <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> one another <S%G1438><s%> <S%G99999><s%> daily <S%G2596><s%>, <S%G2250><s%> while <S%G891><s%> <S%G99999><s%> it is called <S%G2564><s%> To day <S%G4594><s%>; lest <S%G3363><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> be hardened <S%G4645><s%> through the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we are made <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> we hold <S%G2722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of our confidence <S%G5287><s%> steadfast <S%G949><s%> unto <S%G3360><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>;

While <S%G1722><s%> it is said <S%G3004><s%>, To day <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, harden <S%G4645><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the provocation <S%G3894><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> some <S%G5100><s%>, when they had heard <S%G191><s%>, did provoke <S%G3893><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that came <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> with whom <S%G5101><s%> was he grieved <S%G4360><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>? Was it not <S%G3780><s%> with them that had sinned <S%G264><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> carcasses <S%G2966><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> to whom <S%G5101><s%> swore he <S%G3660><s%> that <S%G3361><s%> they should <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>, but <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> to them that believed not <S%G544><s%>?
So <S%G2532><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> enter in <S%G1525><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> unbelief <S%G570><s%>.
